definitions.definition: Any of a class of digestive enzymes , present in saliva and also contributed to the gut by the exocrine pancreas , that break down complex carbohydrates such as starch into simpler sugars such as glucose .

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) Any of a class of digestive enzymes , present in saliva and also contributed to the gut by the exocrine pancreas , that break down complex carbohydrates such as starch into simpler sugars such as glucose .
